name: SuperAnimes, SuperMangas UserCSS from Stake2
description:
Source - Fonte: https://github.com/stake2/sa-style/

SuperAnimes, SuperMangas UserCSS style
UserCSS Style to the website called SuperAnimes: https://www.superanimes.org/
UserCSS made using the Stylus (https://github.com/openstyles/stylus) extension for Firefox
Install it to use this userstyle, then install the userscript
